meaning_str.bing:
v. 服务；提供；接待；任期为
n. 发球
网络. 招待；供职；为…服务

服务；供应；上菜；端上；提供；送达（法律文件）；满足（需求）；实现（目标）；发球；操作（机器等）；服役；服刑；坐牢；执行（任务）；担任（职务）；为…工作；任期为；值班；可用作；对…有用；起作用；产生…的效果

1.en: He might suddenly find himself in a fight--initiating one--and the smallest incident may serve as a trigger.
1.cn: 他会突然发现他自己变得一触即发，极小的事情会成为导火索而引爆。

2.en: I'll start out with a quick example of a standard Java Archive file procedure, which will serve as a foundation for the tips that follow.
2.cn: 我将以一个标准JavaArchive文件产生过程的简单示例开始，这将作为以下技巧的基础。

3.en: On Monday, a State Department spokesman said he doubts Mr. Ahmadinejad's appearance before the council would serve a positive purpose.
3.cn: 美国国务院发言人星期一表示，他对艾哈迈迪内贾德在安理会上露面是否有正面效果表示怀疑。

0.en: We no longer serve you. We serve only us. May the fittest survive.
0.cn: 我们不会再为你们服务。我们只为我们自己服务。适者生存。

1.en: The only way for us to serve you is to give you the means to serve yourselves.
1.cn: 政府为人民服务的唯一办法就是想办法让你们服务自己。

2.en: As a nation, as Americans to serve them as well as they have always served us.
2.cn: 作为一个国家，作为美国人，服务于他们正如他们一直服务于我们一样。

3.en: Well, then I will be honored to serve you, my queen.
3.cn: 那么...很荣幸为您服务，女王陛下。

4.en: I am just a bookkeeper. I tally. I account. I serve.
4.cn: 我就是个簿记员，我只计数，计算，为大汗服务。

5.en: We say we're here to serve you, when in fact, we're serving ourselves. And why? We are driven by our own desire to get reelected.
5.cn: 我们说为人民服务，但其实，我们为自己服务，为什么，因为我们只想着连任。

6.en: Miss Bradshaw? Oh, that's me. I am Gaurau. I will be here to serve you. Thank you.
6.cn: 布莱德肖小姐。是我。我是高鲁，为您服务。谢谢。

7.en: Oh, well, we've got the pink badges! I'm sorry, we can only serve Premier Badge holders.
7.cn: 我们有粉色的徽章。抱歉，我们只服务贵宾徽章会员。

8.en: Before we lift a fork we lend a hand by going out in the community to serve some of our neighbors in need.
8.cn: 在我们就餐前，我们会到社区中做义工为一些需要的邻居们服务。

9.en: Yeah, well, it's in our contract to serve on a university committee. And frankly, this is one I believe in.
9.cn: 我们与学校的合约中注明了得为大学委员会服务，老实说，我也认同这件事。

10.en: And so, as our troops continue to transition back home back to our businesses, our schools, our congregations, and our communities, it's up to all of us to serve them as well as they have served us.
10.cn: 因此，当我们的军人陆续地回到国内，回到我们的商界，我们的学校，我们的教会和我们的社区，现在是我们所有人服务于他们，正如他们曾经服务我们一样。

11.en: 15 years ago, 18 founders in my apartment had a dream, that someday, we can build up a company that can serve millions of small business.
11.cn: 15年前，在我的公寓里，十八位创始人有了一个梦，这个梦想就是，在某一天我们能够创立一个为成千上万小企业主服务的公司。

12.en: We are grateful to the countless Americans who serve their communities in soup kitchens and shelters looking out for those who are less fortunate and lifting up those who have fallen on hard times.
12.cn: 我们感恩无数在救济站和避难所服务于他们社区的国人，他们照料着不是那么幸运的人们，扶助着那些陷入困苦生活的人们。

13.en: You serve the Lord. And through Him, you serve others.
13.cn: 你效忠主通过他效忠众生。

15.en: You really serve people sneezers? Well, I don't.
15.cn: 你真的会在咖啡里加胡椒？不会。

16.en: You can't serve in the Kings-guard with one hand.
16.cn: 你一只手无法胜任御林铁卫。

17.en: Gorgeous. Serve with creme fraiche and orange zest.
17.cn: 很漂亮，配上鲜奶油和橙汁。

18.en: Next, slice some spring onions, then we're ready to serve.
18.cn: 接着，切一些葱，然后就可以装盘了。

19.en: It's not your duty to serve this country alone, and it better not be your goal to simply serve yourself.
19.cn: 你不必一个人效忠国家，也最好不要只想着效忠自己。
